title: ContentPie
introduction: ContentPie is an AI-powered content creation tool designed to help businesses grow organic traffic by generating SEO-optimized content automatically. It aims to drive traffic and improve search engine rankings with minimal effort.
features: Customize outline and style of articles
targetPeople: Entrepreneurs, content creators, and businesses looking to improve their SEO and content marketing efforts.

faqs.question: What is ContentPie?
faqs.answer: ContentPie is an AI-powered content creation tool that helps businesses generate SEO-optimized content automatically to drive traffic and improve search engine rankings.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, ContentPie offers a free trial with no card required.

faqs.question: What are the pricing options?
faqs.answer: ContentPie offers monthly and yearly subscription plans. The monthly plan is $49/month (discounted from $100), and the yearly plan is $39/month (discounted from $80).

faqs.question: What features are included in the subscription?
faqs.answer: The subscription includes unlimited articles, unlimited AI rewrites, unlimited users, Webflow and WordPress integrations, support for 150+ languages, custom feature requests, stock and AI images, and priority support.

faqs.question: Can I generate content in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, ContentPie supports content generation in over 150 languages.

faqs.question: How does the AI rewriting feature work?
faqs.answer: You can highlight any text you want to improve, specify how you want it rewritten (shorten, simplify, add detail), and get the improved text instantly.

faqs.question: What kind of support is available?
faqs.answer: ContentPie offers dedicated 24/7 support through a Slack channel, ready to answer questions and listen to feature requests anytime.

faqs.question: Can I publish content directly to my website?
faqs.answer: Yes, ContentPie allows you to publish content directly to your website with just one click.

faqs.question: Are there any custom features available?
faqs.answer: Yes, ContentPie offers custom feature requests as part of the subscription.
